title: Tale of Two Mag 7 Earnings: GOOGL's Rally v. META's Sell-Off
text: @morningstar's Malik Ahmed Khan talks about the very different earnings stories between Alphabet (GOOGL) and Meta Platforms (META). When it comes to Meta, Malik highlights the key disconnect between the social media giant's capex spend on A.I.

title: Buy the Spike in Alphabet Stock After Its First $100 Billion Quarter?
text: Spiking as much as +6% in Thursday's trading session, Alphabet (GOOGL) stock has started to challenge Nvidia (NVDA) for the most year-to-date gains from the Mag 7.

title: The Numbers that Spooked Wall Street Today
text: Digesting the first batch of Mag 7 earnings

title: Why Amazon Stock Reminds Wedbush's Devitt of Google
text: Wedbush Securities Equity Research Analyst Scott Devitt says Amazon is on the verge of becoming the next Google trade that happened in 2025. He also says Amazon Web Services is going to start contributing more to the business.

title: Alphabet: For The First Time In Three Years, My Rating Is Not A Buy (Downgrade)
text: Alphabet Inc. delivered outstanding Q3 2025 results, with 14% revenue growth and accelerating expansion in Google Search, YouTube, and Google Cloud. AI integration is fueling growth across segments, with Gemini reaching 650 million users and YouTube Premium subscriptions surpassing 300 million, boosting profitability. GOOG's operating margin improved to 42.53%, driven by high-margin businesses like YouTube Premium and Google Cloud, which is rapidly scaling and increasing its deal size.

title: Cloud Gives Boost to GOOGL, Stock Continues All-Time High Run
text: Alphabet (GOOGL) is the "winner on the day" after earnings, says Marley Kayden. She points to the company's cloud growth and A.I.

title: Prediction: 2 AI Stocks Will Be Worth More Than Apple Stock by Year-End in 2026
text: Apple is a laggard in the AI revolution, and you can see it in its financial performance. Amazon is utilizing AI and automation in its cloud computing and e-commerce businesses.

title: Alphabet is an AI winner, says MoffettNathanson's Michael Nathanson
text: Michael Nathanson, MoffettNathanson founding partner, joins 'Power Lunch' to discuss the upcoming big tech earnings results, why Google's search business will get better with AI and much more.

title: Alphabet's Q3 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Increase Y/Y
text: GOOGL's Q3 results shine as AI-driven growth in Search, YouTube and Cloud propel revenues and earnings well past estimates.

title: Sundar Pichai Says Google's 'Universal Search' Moment Is Coming Again — This Time, It's AI
text: When Alphabet Inc.'s (NASDAQ:GOOGL) (NASDAQ:GOOG) Sundar Pichai says "search is evolving," it's not just a product update — it's a strategy shift.

title: Why Alphabet Stock Cycled Higher Today
text: Alphabet crushed on earnings last night, and Google Cloud revenue grew 34%. Total sales growth was 16% for Alphabet, but capital expenditure is growing much faster.

title: Top Stock Movers Now: Chipotle, Meta Platforms, Alphabet, and More
text: Major U.S. equities indexes were mixed Thursday afternoon as President Donald Trump met with Chinese leader Xi Jinping on trade issues and investors digested several big tech earnings reports. The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose but the S&P 500 and Nasdaq were lower.

title: Alphabet Surges on Q3 Earnings Beat: ETFs to Watch
text: Alphabet's strong Q3 earnings lifted its shares and boosted investor sentiment. Explore top ETFs that could benefit from the company's impressive performance.

title: Alphabet analysts boost target price as AI powers Q3 results
text: Oppenheimer & Co analysts late Wednesday raised their target price on Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ:GOOG) to $345 per share, from $300, while reiterating their ‘Outperform' rating, believing that AI is driving an "expansionary moment for Search."    The analysts also believe Google Cloud's momentum is accelerating, with the division of Alphabet approaching profitable growth as the third-largest cloud provider.

title: Alphabet Stock Hits Record High After Google Parent Reports Strong Earnings—Monitor These Key Levels
text: Alphabet (GOOGL) shares jumped to a record high Thursday after the Google parent reported earnings that topped Wall Street estimates, as quarterly revenue surpassed $100 billion for the first time.

title: Alphabet reports first $100B quarter as it turns its massive AI infrastructure bets into revenue
text: CNBC's MacKenzie Sigalos reports on Alphabets blowout quarter, with every major business line including search and cloud reporting accelerating growth.

title: Google's Q3 Sends Stock To New Highs, Analysts Say 'AI Momentum Is Nanobananas'
text: Google parent company Alphabet, Inc. (NASDAQ:GOOGL) (NASDAQ:GOOG) has Wall Street buzzing as its Q3 results shattered expectations and officially marked the company's first quarter clearing $100 billion in revenue.

title: Alphabet Crushes Q3 Earnings, Reports First $100 Billion Quarter
text: The company's third-quarter earnings, reported after the close on Wednesday, Oct. 28, shattered expectations, sending shares surging roughly 7% in after-hours trading.

title: Meta, Microsoft, Google Are Spending Like It's 2021 — And These AI Stocks Are The Real Winners
text: Big Tech's back on a spending binge — only this time, it's not about COVID-19 pandemic-fueled growth or cloud land grabs. Meta Platforms Inc (NASDAQ:META), Microsoft Corp (NASDAQ:MSFT) and Alphabet Inc‘s (NASDAQ:GOOGL) (NASDAQ:GOOG) Google are spending like it's 2021 again, with data centers, GPUs and AI infrastructure replacing metaverse dreams and remote-work hardware as the new capital obsession.

title: Why Alphabet's stock looks like a better play than Meta's in the AI race
text: Both companies are spending big on AI, but Google's diversified business and cost discipline could help it pull ahead

title: Alphabet: Growth, Buybacks, Cheap P/E
text: Alphabet delivered strong Q3'25 earnings, driven by double-digit Cloud growth and robust digital advertising performance. Google's aggressive AI and Cloud-focused CapEx is fueling operating income expansion, with free cash flow up 38.7% year-over-year. Google is set to benefit from a strong digital advertising market in Q4 and will likely continue to buy back a ton of its shares going forward.

title: Alphabet Stock Hits Fresh Peak on Record Quarterly Revenue
text: Shares of Google parent Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ:GOOGL) are up 4.2% to trade at $286.05 at last glance, after the company  reported record revenue of $100 billion for the third quarter, surpassing analysts' expectations.

title: Alphabet stock extends rally after strong Q3: why analysts see more upside ahead
text: Alphabet stock (NASDAQ: GOOG) soared nearly 5% on Thursday, after the tech giant delivered a resounding beat on its third quarter results, shattering expectations and igniting a wave of bullish sentiment across Wall Street. The search and advertising company posted its first-ever $100 billion revenue quarter, reaching $102.35 billion, surpassing analyst estimates of $99.

title: Nasdaq Falls Over 1%; Alphabet Posts Upbeat Earnings
text: U.S. stocks traded mostly lower this morning, with the Nasdaq Composite falling more than 1% on Thursday.

title: Alphabet stock jumps 4% after posting strong results, boosting AI spend
text: Alphabet stock jumped after the company reported strong third-quarter results and increased its capital expenditures for the year. CEO Sundar Pichai said the company had a $155 billion backlog for Google Cloud at the end of the quarter.

title: Amazon Q3 earnings updates: Analysts expect answers on AI progress and AWS as AMZN lags other Mag 7 stocks
text: Amazon is heading into its latest earnings report as the laggard of the Magnificent Seven this year, and investors are looking for some key updates that could spark new momentum. Specifically, Wall Street wants to know more about its AI ambitions and how it plans to position itself against stiff competition from other Big Tech players like Microsoft and Alphabet.

title: GOOGL, MSFT and META Reiterate Enormous Spending in AI Infrastructure
text: GOOGL, MSFT and META ramp up multibillion-dollar AI infrastructure spending as cloud and data center demand accelerates.

title: Satellite maker EnduroSat gets $104 million funding from Google Ventures, others
text: EnduroSat said on Thursday it has raised $104 million from investors, including Google Ventures, Lux Capital and the European Investment Council, as the Bulgaria-based company scales up production of its small and midsized satellites.

title: Dow Jones slip but Nasdaq futures flat after mixed Microsoft, Alphabet, Meta earnings
text: US stock futures were slightly in the red ahead of Thursday's open after the Federal Reserve dampened expectations of further interest rate cuts in the coming months, and despite the successful meeting between Donald Trump and Xi Jinping in the early hours.    Dow Jones futures were down 0.3%, with both S&P 500 and Nasdaq 100 futures just below flat.

title: 5 Things to Know Before the Stock Market Opens
text: Stock futures are losing ground amid a barrage of earnings reports from major companies, as investors assess the latest developments in trade talks and Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's warning that more rate cuts aren't a certainty; President Donald Trump said his meeting with Chinese leader Xi Jinping resulted in a rare earths mineral agreement and a reduction in certain tariffs on China; shares of Meta (META) and Microsoft (MSFT) are losing ground after the Magnificent Seven members reported results late yesterday, while Alphabet (GOOG) shares are surging after the Google parent reported more than $100 billion in quarterly sales; Apple (AAPL) and Amazon (AMZN) are due to release their quarterly reports after the closing bell; and Eli Lilly (LLY) shares are rising after the company reported strong sales of weight loss drug Zepbound and diabetes treatment Mounjaro. Here's what you need to know today.

title: GOOGL Stock vs. META Stock
text: Alphabet (NASDAQ: GOOGL) and Meta Platforms (NASDAQ: META) saw contrasting stock reactions following their third-quarter earnings reports, despite both being key AI plays.

title: India's Reliance Jio users to get 18-month free access to Google's Gemini AI Pro
text: Google's Gemini AI Pro subscription plan will be offered for free to Reliance Jio users in India for 18 months, the companies said on Thursday.

title: Evercore ISI's Mark Mahaney breaks down Meta, Alphabet Q3 results
text: Mark Mahaney, Evercore ISI head of internet research, joins 'Squawk Box' to discuss Meta and Alphabet's quarterly earnings results.

title: Alphabet (NASDAQ:GOOG) Trading 2.5% Higher  on Earnings Beat
text: Shares of Alphabet Inc. (NASDAQ: GOOG - Get Free Report) traded up 2.5% during trading on Wednesday after the company announced better than expected quarterly earnings. The stock traded as high as $275.97 and last traded at $275.17. 24,227,200 shares changed hands during trading, an increase of 4% from the average session volume of 23,339,484 shares.

title: Big Tech after-hours: Meta spooks the market as Alphabet sails through and Microsoft steadies
text: A lively after-hours session in New York left a clear pecking order. Alphabet breezed past expectations and was rewarded; Microsoft posted solid numbers but not quite the moonshot Azure bulls wanted; and Meta (easily the most dramatic) unveiled a heftier artificial intelligence spend that rattled nerves and knocked tens of billions off its value.

title: 5 Tech Stocks You Can Buy and Hold for the Next Decade
text: Alphabet is well-positioned to capitalize on opportunities across AI infrastructure, software, and emerging use cases. Meta Platforms could leverage AI to take its business beyond the smartphone landscape.

title: Tech leaders ramp up AI spending, but Alphabet's cash flow wins investor favor
text: Three of the biggest U.S. technology companies flagged plans on Wednesday to accelerate capital spending over the next year but investors were most accepting of Google-parent Alphabet's ability to fund its plans from its cash flow.
